positionIsContextOfMembershipRelation.description: Connects a Position to a Membership Relation (the member Person occupies that Position).
positionIsContextOfMembershipRelation.label: position is context of membership relation

overlapsOrOverlapped.description: Connects two Places that geographically overlap or overlapped. This object property is symmetric.
overlapsOrOverlapped.label: overlaps or overlapped

ownershipRelationHasTarget.description: Connects an Ownership Relation to a Thing that is owned.
ownershipRelationHasTarget.label: owner ship relation has target

thingIsTargetOfOwnershipRelation.description: Connects a Thing (that is owned by a Group, a Person or a Position) to an Ownership Relation.
thingIsTargetOfOwnershipRelation.label: thing is target of ownership relation

personHasSiblingRelation.description: Connects a Person to a Sibling Relation.
personHasSiblingRelation.label: person has sibling relation

siblingRelationConnects.description: Connects a Sibling Relation to one of the siblings involved.
siblingRelationConnects.label: sibling relation connects

personHasSpouseRelation.description: Connects a Person to a Spouse Relation.
personHasSpouseRelation.label: person has spouse relation

spouseRelationConnects.description: Connects a Sibling Relation to one of the spouses involved.
spouseRelationConnects.label: spouse relation connects

personIsSourceOfPositionHoldingRelation.description: Connects a Person (who occupies a Position) to a Position Holding Relation.
personIsSourceOfPositionHoldingRelation.label: person is source of position holding relation

positionHoldingRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Position Holding Relation to a Person (who occupies a Position).
positionHoldingRelationHasSource.label: position holding relation has source

personIsSourceOfTeachingRelation.description: Connects a Person (as a teacher) to a Teaching Relation.
personIsSourceOfTeachingRelation.label: person is source of teaching relation

teachingRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Teaching Relation to a Person (who is a teacher).
teachingRelationHasSource.label: teaching relation has source

personIsTargetOfTeachingRelation.description: Connects a Person (as a student) to a Teaching Relation.
personIsTargetOfTeachingRelation.label: person is target of teaching relation

teachingRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Teaching Relation to a Person (who is a student).
teachingRelationHasTarget.label: teaching relation has target

placeIsSourceOfPlaceRelation.description: Connects a Place (as associated to a Thing) to a Place Relation.
placeIsSourceOfPlaceRelation.label: place is source of place relation

placeRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Place Relation to the Place concerned.
placeRelationHasSource.label: place relation has source

placeRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Place Relation to a Thing that is associated to the Place.
placeRelationHasTarget.label: place relation has target

thingIsTargetOfPlaceRelation.description: Connects a Thing (that is associated with a Place) to a Place Relation.
thingIsTargetOfPlaceRelation.label: thing is target of place relation

positionHoldingRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Position Holding Relation to a Position (that is occupied).
positionHoldingRelationHasTarget.label: position holding relation has target

positionIsTargetOfPositionHoldingRelatio.description: Connects a Position (that is occupied by a Person) to a Position Holding Relation.
positionIsTargetOfPositionHoldingRelatio.label: position is target of position holding relation

positionIsSourceOfPositionToGroupRelatio.description: Connects a Position (that exists within a Group) to a Position to Group Relation.
positionIsSourceOfPositionToGroupRelatio.label: position is source of position to group relation

positionToGroupRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Position to Group Relation to a Position (that exists in a Group).
positionToGroupRelationHasSource.label: position to group relation has source

recordResourceOrInstantiationIsSourceOfP.description: Connects a Record Resource or Instantiation (that is created or accumulated by an Agent, or documents an Activity) to a Provenance Relation.
recordResourceOrInstantiationIsSourceOfP.label: record resource or instantiation is source of provenance relation

proxyFor.description: Connects a Proxy to the Record Resource it stands for in the specific context of a Record Set.
proxyFor.label: proxy for

proxyIn.description: Connects a Proxy to the Record Set in which it stands for (represents) another Record Resource.
proxyIn.label: proxy in

recordResourceGeneticRelationConnects.description: Connects a Record Resource Genetic Relation to one of the associated Record Resources.
recordResourceGeneticRelationConnects.label: record resource genetic relation connects

recordResourceRelationConnects.description: Connects a Record Resource relation to one of the related Record Resources.
recordResourceRelationConnects.label: record resource relation connects

recordResourceIsConnectedToRecordResourc.description: Connects a Record Resource to a Record Resource Genetic Relation.
recordResourceIsConnectedToRecordResourc.label: record resource is connected to record resource genetic relation

recordResourceHoldingRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Record Resource Holding Relation to a Record Resource or Instantiation (that is held by an Agent).
recordResourceHoldingRelationHasTarget.label: record resource holding relation has target

recordResourceOrInstantiationIsTargetOfR.description: Connects a Record Resource or Instantiation (that is held by an Agent) to a Record Resource Holding Relation.
recordResourceOrInstantiationIsTargetOfR.label:
record resource or instantiation is target of record resource
            holding relation

recordResourceIsConnectedToRecordResourc.description: Connects a Record Resource to a Record Resource Relation.
recordResourceIsConnectedToRecordResourc.label: record resource is connected to record resource relation

recordResourceIsSourceOfRecordResourceTo.description: Connects a Record Resource (that was instantiated) to a Record Resource To Instantiation Relation
recordResourceIsSourceOfRecordResourceTo.label:
record resource is source of record resource to instantiation
            relation

recordResourceToInstantiationRelationHas.description: Connects a Record Resource To Instantiation Relation to the Record Resource (that was instantiated).
recordResourceToInstantiationRelationHas.label: record resource to instantiation relation has source

sequentialRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Sequential Relation to a Thing that precedes other Thing(s) in the sequence.
sequentialRelationHasSource.label: sequential relation has source

thingIsSourceOfSequentialRelation.description: Connects a Thing to a Sequential Relation, when this Thing precedes other Thing(s) in the sequence.
thingIsSourceOfSequentialRelation.label: thing is source of sequential relation

sequentialRelationHasTarget.label: sequential relation has target

thingIsTargetOfSequentialRelation.description: Connects a Thing (that follows other Thing(s) in a sequence) to a Sequential Relation.
thingIsTargetOfSequentialRelation.label: thing is target of sequential relation

thingIsTargetOfTypeRelation.description: Connects a Thing (that is categorized by a Type) to a Type Relation.
thingIsTargetOfTypeRelation.label: thing is target of type relation

typeRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Type Relation to a Thing (that is categorized by the involved Type).
typeRelationHasTarget.label: type relation has target

typeIsSourceOfTypeRelation.description: Connects a Type (a category) to a Type Relation.
typeIsSourceOfTypeRelation.label: type is source of type relation

typeRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Type Relation to the Type (that categorizes the involved Thing(s)).
typeRelationHasSource.label: type relation has source
